Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Bowl
Description: Semispherical pottery bowl with wide mouth, rounded rim and unstable base with convex bottom. Reddish-coloured paste, both interior and exterior surface covered with a polished coating of a reddish-brown colour.
